hero.headline: Transform Your Outdoor Space
hero.subheadline: Custom Landscape Design • Installation • Maintenance • Irrigation

about.title: Crafting Beautiful Landscapes Since 2008
about.text: At GreenScape, we believe your outdoor space should be an extension of your home. Our award-winning design team creates custom landscapes that blend beauty with functionality. From drought-resistant native gardens to lush tropical retreats, we bring your vision to life and maintain it year-round.

services.name: Landscape Design
services.description: Custom 3D designs tailored to your property, lifestyle, and budget. See your dream yard before we break ground.

services.name: Installation
services.description: Expert installation of plants, trees, hardscaping, lighting, and irrigation systems.

services.name: Lawn Maintenance
services.description: Weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly maintenance packages to keep your landscape pristine.

services.name: Irrigation Systems
services.description: Smart irrigation design, installation, and repair. Save water and keep plants thriving.

testimonials.name: Patricia H.
testimonials.content: They transformed our boring backyard into an oasis. The outdoor kitchen and fire pit are now our favorite hangout spot!

testimonials.name: Robert & Lynn M.
testimonials.content: Professional from design to completion. They stayed on budget and the results exceeded our expectations.

testimonials.name: Carlos G.
testimonials.content: Our water bill dropped 40% after they installed the smart irrigation system. Plants look healthier too!
